name: Adams et al., Appellants, v. Hare et al.

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Sohaeeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Adams et al., Appellants, v. Hare et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of the learned judge in the court below.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John J. McDevitt, Jr., for appellants.
Francis B. Bracken, with him Frederick H. Knight, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Adams et al., Appellants, v. Hare et al.
Argued January 16, 1934.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Sohaeeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
John J. McDevitt, Jr., for appellants.
Gerald F. Flood, for appellees.
Francis B. Bracken, with him Frederick H. Knight, for appellee.
Frank Rogers Donahue, for appellee.
January 30, 1934:
